attributes.action: Seriously toughen the laws on immigration and stop this nation from being a walk over!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is for people who believe this nation is a walk over to anyone who steps foot on our soil. We need tougher immigration laws and to send back those who are here illegaly!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
